name: Rock & Roll The Dice
description:
Rock & Roll the Dice is an action rhythm game with Pixel Art graphics. 

We designed it for a 50-hour game jam event "GMTK Game Jam 2022"  organized by Game Maker's Toolkit.

Story

You're a honey bagder names Süleyman with leather waistcoat and his synthesizer guitar.  You have entered an abandoned place called "Backgammon Cellar". You saw a stranger with weird appearance and a synthesizer guitar. He introduced himself as "Cultist Of Backgammon". He wanted a battle, and you had no chance to escape from there. And then... fight started...

Gameplay

A & D keys for moving right and left. Also there's SPACE key for attack the opponent. 

Enemy throws 2 item; rocks and dices. Rocks gives damage to player but we need to collect the dices because the same numbered dices inflict damage exponentially while damaging the enemy. 

For example, the player collects 2 number 3 dice and 1 number 4 dice.

When the player attacks gives 2³ + 1⁴ damage to the enemy.

Enemy healt is 1000, player is 100.
